Question: The tax board had filed a lien against this person on 7 April 2009.
Hints: For a time, she was known as this person Lee (or Pamela Lee) after marrying Mötley Crüe drummer Tommy Lee.
This person then starred in Pam: Girl on the Loose, which debuted on 3 August 2008 on E! in the United States.
This was this person's first foray into reality television.
